thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 28 of 7163
thread.title: Shawn

author: Shawn
title: Shawn
text: The site is easy to navigate, has a ton of information, and is easy to navigate. The times I used the chat to have someone answer my questions the representative appeared quickly and, to the best of my knowledge, thorough. I guess if I could make one suggestion would be that, while you can compare items side by side, recommendations would be pretty helpful. For instance, if you're comparing two lenses, a recommendation from the experts would be helpful.
